channel.title: 317 Problem
channel.description: Ok before I had a pvp problem but now I have another problem This problem wasnt caused by how I fixed the pvp problem Ok so here's the problem for every character I make he starts off as lv 3 all skills lv 1 and hp lv 10, but the hp says this 99/10 <-- WTF! How do I change it to 10 when I log in with a new player P.S Not the other way by going to that characters file with the rights thing and changing it too 10 no not that way :mad: :( :confused:

item.title: 317 Problem
item.dc:creator: @Unknown_Supreme Unknown Supreme
item.description:
@Unknown_Supreme wrote:

Your problem is probably in Player.java, also don’t abuse the smileys. It just makes you look uneducated.

Read full topic

item.title: 317 Problem
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

You need to change how much xp the player has in that skill when he first logs in. Hitpoints is playerlevel 3 I think.

Read full topic

item.title: 317 Problem
item.dc:creator: @godson_ninja godson ninja
item.description:
@godson_ninja wrote:

Ok before I had a pvp problem but now I have another problem This problem wasnt caused by how I fixed the pvp problem
Ok so here’s the problem for every character I make he starts off as lv 3 all skills lv 1 and hp lv 10, but the hp says this 99/10 <-- WTF!
How do I change it to 10 when I log in with a new player
P.S Not the other way by going to that characters file with the rights thing and changing it too 10 no not that way
:mad:
